name: Game in 1h
description:
Racing game Singleplayer.

Do note this is a game which is very low optimized game due to lack of Time.  My GTX 970(Overclocked with K boost In MSI Afterburner) gets around 24 FPS in the unity editor.

Controlls:

W: Forward

S: Backwards

A: Left

D: Right

Space: Handbrake

Left ctrl: Clutch

Left alt: Hear Shift

Left Shift: Gear Mode Select

1: Gear one

2: Gear two

3: Gear three

4: Gear four

5: Gear five

6: Gear six

K: Start Motor

L: Turn on Lights

N: Neutral

R: Backwards
